name: ALLSALE Corp.
description: AI-driven influencer marketing platform purpose-built for beauty brands leveraging the explosive growth of TikTok Shop in the U.S. The company addresses the increasing demand for automated, data-driven influencer campaigns that prioritize measurable ROI.

name: APX Solutions Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a cloud freight consolidator platform intended to optimize business operations. The company's platform specializes in offering services including admin control, order management, shipment processing, dispatch management, and route optimization, enabling businesses to automate manual tasks and improve supply chain efficiency and profitability.

name: Baycon, Inc.
description: Operator of a B2C and B2B eSIM platform called 'eSIM Easy" with an emphasis on elevating roaming services for inbound and outbound travelers globally.

name: Simplemarket Inc.
description: Operator of a B2B marketplace intended to connect informal retailers directly with wholesalers and manufacturers. The company's platform helps small retailers source their inventory, and access financing, and essential insurance services, helping retailers to streamline their digital procurement and financing.

industry: CPG (Consumer packaged goods), Retail, B2B Marketplaces

name: TECH FOR GOOD, LLC
description: Developer of a digital waste management platform designed to achieve a systemic change. The company's platform helps to democratize technology for the entire waste management sector with innovative, accessible, and easy-to-use technology, enabling collection companies to monitor their operation, automatically know the kilos they collect, and analyze their data so that they can optimize their business and reduce their costs.
one_liner: Developer of a digital waste management platform designed to achieve a systemic change. The company's platform helps to democratize technology for the entire waste management sector with innovative, accessible, and easy-to-use technology, enabling collection companies to monitor their operation, automatically know the kilos they collect, and analyze their data so that they can optimize their business and reduce their costs.

name: Boon, Inc
description: Boon is the world’s most agile referral hiring platform that scales across your entire community to deliver better hires, faster.

name: Dentacarts Ltd
description: Developer of an online dental marketplace platform designed to sell dental supplies and materials. The company's platform offers a wide variety of dental tools and equipment from trusted vendors and agents, enabling dentists and dental clinic managers to access all dental supplies, equipment, and services online.

name: Bettertheworld, Inc.
description: Developer of a team funding platform designed to revolutionize the way sports teams raise money. The company's platform allows the team to manage their funds and provides cash back from purchases made for groceries, gas, clothes, equipment, meals out, travel and as well as allows donation collection, enabling youth sports teams to raise money in a hassle-free manner.

name: Medicarri
description: Operator of an online marketplace intended to sell medical goods. The company's marketplace offers hospital supplies, and medical products, enabling medical suppliers to connect with clinics.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace intended to sell medical goods. The company's marketplace offers hospital supplies, and medical products, enabling medical suppliers to connect with clinics.

name: Pawdlers Inc
description: Operator of a pet care platform intended to build trust relationships among pet owners, pet care providers and pet experts. The company connects pet owners with pet care providers, such as dog walkers, groomers and trainers, enabling pet owners to provide a variety of features that help pet owners to find reliable and trustworthy pet care providers.

name: PT Sinari Generasi Indonesia
description: Developer of procurement platform designed for purchasing industrial products at the lowest prices for the business. The company's platform specializes in business and industrial needs, specifically electrical and engineering equipment and building and construction supplies with the support of technology, enabling businesses with reasonable price offers and bringing together trusted raw material supplier partners by increasing the selling of raw materials.

name: Propagate Holdings, Inc.
description: Developer of e-commerce incubator designed to acquire a majority stake in brands, scale, and exit to acquisition partners. The company services offer growth marketing, branding, data collection, customer service, and supply chain management, enabling businesses to elevate their brand image and increase their sales margin.

name: Scouter LLC
description: Operator of an online property rental platform intended to provide vacation properties. The company's platform offers properties for various events such as workshops, parties, shooting, etc, and also allows owners to rent out their property via its platform, enabling users to book properties according to their requirements.

name: ShearShare, Inc.
description: Developer of a business-to-business mobile platform designed to increase empty salon chairs on demand. The company's platform matches salon and barbershop owners with licensed beauty professionals, enabling stylists to find and book working spaces for rent.

name: Simpatico Project, Inc.
description: Operator of a B2B mental healthcare platform intended to target the demand for psychological counseling from B2B customers and establish a healthy psychological counseling culture. The company develops a psychological counseling program optimized for the issues faced by executives and employees of companies and organizations in each field, such as executives of large corporations, lawyers and firefighters, enabling employees to match professional counselors in each field to provide corporate counseling through artificial intelligence.

name: VICO ROOMS, Inc.
description: Operator of a room and apartment searching platform designed to help students find their shared housing. The company's platform offers a wide variety of places to choose from according to preferences and conditions that are verified by a lease contract, allowing young professionals to find their new shared home and integrate themselves into the new culture.

description: Developer of climate action platform designed to offset carbon emissions. The company focuses on the environmental aspects of corporate operations, including ESG management and carbon credit purchase, marketplace, and carbon information provision, helping achieve true carbon-neutral win-win cooperation between developed and developing countries.
